Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes Bret Steve to receive certain service credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law
Summary: Authorizes Bret Steve to receive certain service credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize Bret Steve to receive certain service credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law
